context: Hello. I have both a PS4 and Xbox One. I was given the PS4 Gold Headset for a present. I was curious would this work with them? Thank you.
response: Yes I have s gold headset and use it for both consoles. With the ps4 it is completely wireless and with the xbox one you'll need to plug the headset into the controller adaptor, so while for the xbox it's not totally wireless it still requires no connection to the console itself.

context: Can you remove the orange keys and replace them with black ones (does the keyboard come with any)?
response: There are no additional keys (orange or black) in the box.  Also, the enter/return key is not as long side-to-side as the typical keyboard and has caused a number of typing errors for me.
